title: Minion Origins Post Lore-Change
body: So, being a major Summoner Lore-freak, I was wondering as to the origins of the minions we see on Summoners Rift? Back when Summoners still existed, the minions were magical conjurations that were summoned prior to the battle, but now that the IoW is gone, what are the minions now?

replies.body: it might interest us more if we *didnt* know because it would make us think?

But mate, seriously, it's the knowing that makes it fun. Would be no fun if we never knew what things were. Imagine reading Lord of the Rings and never knowing who Sauron actually is? Or Gandalf. Bad analogy I know, but basically I wanna know :O

But, do you REALLY want to know? what if they were orphans the league abducts to fight as cannon fodder. Covered fully from head to toe, drugged and gagged. Their short lives end with them walking down the lane, the next thing they know your {{champion:122}}  blade has sliced them in half. All for a bag of gold conveniently placed in their pockets. Can you live with yourself every time you cs, "Minions" is a term created by summoners to alienate then, make them seem less human, allows us to kill them without remorse. Maybe the league isn't all its cut out to be.
Maybe they're now just little rabbits in cute costumes **that must fight to the death in the name of violence.**

> Maybe they're now just little rabbits in cute costumes **that must fight to the death in the name of violence.**

ive seen enough hentai to know where this is going
Riot has been lacking in giving us lore as of late, and I'd like proper explanations of... everything!
They are the souls res-erected from Amumu's **rage**... imagine lol.

Riot is more than likely changing the lore into something they can use to promote themselves even further in to the mainstream of.. well everyone. Man I wouldn't be surprised if Lol survives long enough for a movie to be made about it. I'd like to know about minions new origins but I wouldn't  hold your breath anything lore related for a really long time. I'm just hoping that when it does come out It blows my mind
Because gameplay and story segregation happened. I doubt they'll revisit minions any time soon.
